item.title: Validation of blended NPSB fertilizer rates on yield, yield components of Teff [Eragrostis tef (Zuccagni) Trotter] at vertisols of Hatsebo, Central Tigray, Ethiopia
item.description: Application of unbalanced nutrition was the main yield limiting factor in the study area.
